items.sentence: I tried to stop their quarrel, but that wasn't easy.
I forgot to bring the book. It just slipped my mind.
I haven't heard a word from them in over four years.
I met an old friend of mine at a bookshop yesterday.
I was caught in the rain and got soaked to the skin.
I have no time to put my books in order before I go.
I lost my way and, what was worse, it began to rain.
We need to make sure that this doesn't happen again.
I wonder why Tom suggested that I do that by myself.
Tom realized that something had gone terribly wrong.
No matter how thin you slice it, it's still baloney.
I can't 100% guarantee that I'll be there on Monday.
I suspect that Tom didn't want to do that yesterday.
I'm looking for someone to travel to Boston with me.
If I'd known Tom needed help, I could've helped him.
I'm afraid that I'll be stuck in this place forever.
Tom said that he thought he had forgotten something.
I don't need very much help, but I do need a little.
It sounds like you guys have a healthy relationship.
Tom and Mary had an argument and now Mary is crying.
